name.ja: ライダースジャケット

en: Resting for 2 seconds grants a HP shield
Shield: 45 + Character Level*6(Melee)/4.5(Ranged)
ja: 2秒間休息状態を続ける時
45+キャラクターレベル*6(近)/4.5(遠)のシールドを獲得
cn: Resting for 2 seconds grants a HP shield
Shield: 45 + Character Level*6(Melee)/4.5(Ranged)

kr: 스킬 공격 시, 대상의 치유 효과가 40%(근)/30%(원) 감소
en: Skills reduce target's healing received by 40%(Melee)/30%(Ranged)
ja: スキル攻撃のダメージを受けた対象の治癒効果が減少
cn: Skills reduce target's healing received by 40%(Melee)/30%(Ranged)

kr: 전투에 돌입하면 매 초마다 2.5m 이내의 적에게 피해를 입힘
en: Deals cellular damage to enemies in a 2.5m range every 1second when in combat
Damage: 4.5%(Melee)/3%(Ranged) of User's Max HP
ja: 戦闘に突入すると1秒ごとに周り2.5mの敵に固有ダメージ
ダメージ:最大体力の4.5%(近)/3%(遠)
cn: Deals cellular damage to enemies in a 2.5m range every 1second when in combat
Damage: 4.5%(Melee)/3%(Ranged) of User's Max HP

kr: 굴절의 망토는 적이 가하는 다음 스킬 및 트랩의 피해와 효과를 한번 보호해 준 뒤 소멸
en: Create a temporal anomaly
The temporal anomaly is negating damage and effects of the next hostile skill or trap
The anomaly then disappears, returning after 25 seconds
ja: 屈折のマントを装備
屈折のマントは敵が自分に与える次のスキルまたはトラップのダメージと効果を一度保護してから消えます。
25秒後に再生成
cn: Create a temporal anomaly
The temporal anomaly is negating damage and effects of the next hostile skill or trap
The anomaly then disappears, returning after 25 seconds

kr: 적 실험체에게 피해를 받아 체력이 40% 이하가 될 때 발동
en: When dropping below 40% HP after taking damage from an enemy player
You are cleansed of all debuffs and crowd control effects
You gain a (150 + Character Level*10) HP shield for 1.5 seconds
10 Attack Power for 8 seconds
HP Recovery on you is (M: 15%, R: 8%) more effective for 8 seconds
Cooldown: 50s
ja: 着用者が敵実験体にダメージを受け、体力が40%以下になる時
すべてのデバフを解除
1.5秒間150+キャラクターレベル*10のシールドを獲得
8秒間攻撃力が10増加
15%(近)/8%(遠)の受ける回復量が増加
クールダウン:50秒
cn: When dropping below 40% HP after taking damage from an enemy player
You are cleansed of all debuffs and crowd control effects
You gain a (150 + Character Level*10) HP shield for 1.5 seconds
10 Attack Power for 8 seconds
HP Recovery on you is (M: 15%, R: 8%) more effective for 8 seconds
Cooldown: 50s

name.ja: ファントムジャケット

only.ja: マイだけが制作できる。

kr: 전투에 돌입하면 매 초마다 2.5m 이내의 적에게 피해를 입힘
en: Deals cellular damage to enemies in a 2.5m range every 1second when in combat
Damage: 5%(Melee)/4%(Ranged) of User's Max HP
ja: 戦闘に突入すると1秒ごとに周り2.5mの敵に固有ダメージ
ダメージ:最大体力の5%(近)/4%(遠)
cn: Deals cellular damage to enemies in a 2.5m range every 1second when in combat
Damage: 5%(Melee)/4%(Ranged) of User's Max HP

only.ja: マイだけが制作できる。
マイだけが制作できる。

kr: 피해를 입은 적의 체력이 11%(근거리)/8.5%(원거리) 이하라면 즉시 처형합니다.
en: Dealing damage to a test subject with 11%(Melee)/8.5%(Ranged) or less HP remaining kills them instantly.
Cooldown: 30s
ja: ダメージを受けた敵の体力が11%(近距離)/8.5%(遠距離) 以下の場合、即時処置します。
クールダウン:30秒
cn: Dealing damage to a test subject with 11%(Melee)/8.5%(Ranged) or less HP remaining kills them instantly.
Cooldown: 30s

only.ja: プリヤだけが装備できる。
プリヤだけが装備できる。

kr: 3초 안에 700의 피해를 입으면 6m 범위에 150 고유 데미지
en: When hit by a basic attack, reflect 4.5% true damage to the attacker
Reduce their healing by 40%(Melee)/30%(Ranged) for 4 seconds
Taking 700 or more damage over 3 seconds causes 150 damage to nearby enemies
Cooldown: 3s
ja: 基本攻撃から受けたダメージの4.5%を攻撃者に固定ダメージで返します。
40%(近)/30%(遠)の治癒減少効果
3秒間累積して700のダメージを受けると、周りに150のダメージ
クールダウン:3秒
cn: When hit by a basic attack, reflect 4.5% true damage to the attacker
Reduce their healing by 40%(Melee)/30%(Ranged) for 4 seconds
Taking 700 or more damage over 3 seconds causes 150 damage to nearby enemies
Cooldown: 3s

kr: 적 실험체에게 피해를 받아 체력이 40% 이하가 될 때 발동
en: When dropping below 40% HP after taking damage from an enemy player
You gain a (100 + Character Level*9) HP shield for 1.5 seconds
Your skill amplification is increased by 12% for 6 seconds
Cooldown: 50s
ja: 着用者が敵実験体にダメージを受け、体力が40%以下になる時
1.5秒間100+キャラクターレベル*9のシールドを獲得
6秒間スキル増幅が12%増加
クールダウン:50秒
cn: When dropping below 40% HP after taking damage from an enemy player
You gain a (100 + Character Level*9) HP shield for 1.5 seconds
Your skill amplification is increased by 12% for 6 seconds
Cooldown: 50s

kr: 이동 스킬 사용 시, 다음 기본 공격의 사거리가 1 증가합니다.
en: Increases the range of your next basic attack by 1 when casting movement skills.
Max 2 stacks
Cooldown 6s
ja: 移動スキル使用時、次の基本攻撃の射程距離が1増加します。
最大2スタック
クールダウン 6秒
cn: Increases the range of your next basic attack by 1 when casting movement skills.
Max 2 stacks
Cooldown 6s

only.ja: プリヤだけが装備できる。

kr: 스킬 사용 후, 4초 이내에 다음 기본 공격은 추가 피해
en: Using a skill causes a Biotic Infusion
Biotic Infusion: your next basic attack within 4 seconds deals extra cellular damage
Damage: equivalent to 10%(Melee)/8%(Ranged) of the enemy's max HP
Cooldown: 2s
ja: スキルを使用すると意念をチャージ
チャージした状態で次の4秒内の基本攻撃が追加固有ダメージ
ダメージ:敵最大体力の10%
クールダウン:2秒
cn: Using a skill causes a Biotic Infusion
Biotic Infusion: your next basic attack within 4 seconds deals extra cellular damage
Damage: equivalent to 10%(Melee)/8%(Ranged) of the enemy's max HP
Cooldown: 2s

name.ja: タクティカル·バイザー

en: When hit by a basic attack, reflect 4.5% true damage to the attacker
Reduce their healing by 40%(Melee)/30%(Ranged) for 4 seconds
Taking 600 or more damage over 3 seconds causes 600 damage to nearby enemies
Cooldown: 2s
ja: 基本攻撃から受けたダメージの4.5%を攻撃者に固定ダメージで返します。
40%(近)/30%(遠)の治癒減少効果
4秒間累積して600のダメージを受けると、周りに150のダメージ
クールダウン:2秒
cn: When hit by a basic attack, reflect 4.5% true damage to the attacker
Reduce their healing by 40%(Melee)/30%(Ranged) for 4 seconds
Taking 600 or more damage over 3 seconds causes 600 damage to nearby enemies
Cooldown: 2s

kr: 스킬 공격 시, 대상의 치유 효과가 40%(근)/30%(원) 감소
en: Skills reduce target's healing received by 40%(Melee)/30%(Ranged)
ja: スキル攻撃のダメージを受けた対象の治癒効果が減少
cn: Skills reduce target's healing received by 40%(Melee)/30%(Ranged)

name.ja: スカディのブレスレット

kr: 스킬 공격에 적중당한 적은 1초간 이동속도 20% 감소
en: Dealing damage to an enemy with a skill slows them by 20% for 1 second
Cooldown: 3s
ja: スキルで敵にダメージを与えると、1秒間移動速度を20%だけ減少
クールダウン:3秒
cn: Dealing damage to an enemy with a skill slows them by 20% for 1 second
Cooldown: 3s

name.ja: テルリアンタイムピース

kr: 굴절의 망토는 적이 가하는 다음 스킬 및 트랩의 피해와 효과를 한번 보호해 준 뒤 소멸
en: Create a temporal anomaly
The temporal anomaly is negating damage and effects of the next hostile skill or trap
The anomaly then disappears, returning after 25 seconds
ja: 屈折のマントを装備
屈折のマントは敵が自分に与える次のスキルまたはトラップのダメージと効果を一度保護してから消えます。
25秒後に再生成
cn: Create a temporal anomaly
The temporal anomaly is negating damage and effects of the next hostile skill or trap
The anomaly then disappears, returning after 25 seconds

kr: 매 기본 공격마다 5초 동안 전자기 충격 스택을 얻습니다(최대 2회 충전)
최대 충전된 상태로 기본 공격하거나, 보호막이 있는 대상을 기본 공격할 때 추가 고유 피해를 입히고 모든 전자기 충격 스택을 잃습니다
피해량: 적 최대 체력의 4%(근)/3%(원)+30~78(캐릭터 레벨 비례)
en: Grants a stack of Electric Shock for 5 seconds per basic attack. (Maximum 2 times)
Basic attacks with maximum stacks or towards a shielded enemy deal additional cellular damage and remove all your Electric Shock stacks.
Damage: 4%(Melee)/3%(Ranged) Enemy’s Max HP+30~78(Proportional to Character Level)
ja: 基本攻撃するたびに5秒間電撃スタックを獲得します。(最大2回までチャージ)
最大チャージされた状態で基本攻撃したり、シールドがある対象を基本攻撃すると、追加固有ダメージを与え、すべての電撃スタックは消滅します。
ダメージ量: 敵最大体力の4%(近)/3%(遠)+30~78(キャラクターレベル比例)
cn: Grants a stack of Electric Shock for 5 seconds per basic attack. (Maximum 2 times)
Basic attacks with maximum stacks or towards a shielded enemy deal additional cellular damage and remove all your Electric Shock stacks.
Damage: 4%(Melee)/3%(Ranged) Enemy’s Max HP+30~78(Proportional to Character Level)

name.ja: 鋼鉄ひざプロテクター

kr: 기본 공격 시, 대상의 치유 효과가 40%(근)/30%(원) 감소
en: Basic attacks reduce target's healing received by 40%(Melee)/30%(Ranged)
ja: 基本攻撃を受けた対象の治癒効果が減少:40%(近)/30%(遠)

ja: 制圧、エアボーン、ノックバック、捕まりを除外したデバフの持続時間が15%減少
cn: Reduces crowd control effects by 15%

ja: スキル攻撃のダメージを受けた対象の治癒効果が減少

kr: 이후 3초간 초당 잃은 체력과 스태미너의 5.5% 회복
en: Activate to instantly heal 6.5% of your max HP
Recover 5.5% of your missing HP & SP per second for 3 seconds
Taking damage will end the effect
Cooldown: 30s
ja: アイテムを使用すると、最大体力の6.5%を即時回復
その後毎秒失った体力とスタミナの5.5%を3秒間回復
ダメージを受けた場合、解除
クールダウン:30秒
cn: Activate to instantly heal 6.5% of your max HP
Recover 5.5% of your missing HP & SP per second for 3 seconds
Taking damage will end the effect
Cooldown: 30s

kr: 충전 스택에 따라 최대 0.08의 추가 이동속도 증가
다음 기본 공격 시 스택을 모두 소모하여 최대 80의 고유피해
근거리 실험체는 최대 스택 공격 시 2초간 상대의 이동 속도 20% 감소
en: Gain a stack every move, up to 20m
Your movement speed will increase by up to 0.08, based on how many stacks you have
Basic attacks consume all stacks, dealing up to 80 cellular damage
Melee: At max stacks, your next basic attack slows enemies by 20% for 2 seconds
ja: 移動するたびに[軽い足取り]を最大20mまで重畳して獲得
重畳によって移動速度が最大0.08まで増加します
基本攻撃ダメージを与える場合、重畳をすべて消費して最大80の固有ダメージを与えます
近距離:最大重畳状態でダメージを受けた対象の移動速度を2秒間20%減少させます
cn: Gain a stack every move, up to 20m
Your movement speed will increase by up to 0.08, based on how many stacks you have
Basic attacks consume all stacks, dealing up to 80 cellular damage
Melee: At max stacks, your next basic attack slows enemies by 20% for 2 seconds

kr: 스킬 공격을 가하면 적에게 <저주> 디버프를 부여
<저주> 상태가 해제될 때, 고정 피해를 입힘
한 번 <저주> 효과를 받은 적은 8초간 같은 효과를 받지 않음
기본 공격 시 저주 대기시간 1초 감소
en: Hitting an enemy with a skill hexes them
Dealing true damage when the hex expires
Damage: 45 + Skill Amplification*1
Targets cannot be hexed again for 8 seconds
Basic attacks reduce this cooldown by 1s
Cooldown: 2s
ja: スキル攻撃を加えると敵が＜呪い＞の状態になります。
＜呪い＞の状態から解除されると固定ダメージ
ダメージ:45+スキル増幅*1
一度＜呪い＞の状態になると8秒間再び＜呪い＞の状態になりません。
基本攻撃時1秒減少
クールダウン:2秒
cn: Hitting an enemy with a skill hexes them
Dealing true damage when the hex expires
Damage: 45 + Skill Amplification*1
Targets cannot be hexed again for 8 seconds
Basic attacks reduce this cooldown by 1s
Cooldown: 2s

en: Slowing by 6%
Duration: 4s
ja: 移動速度:6%減少
4秒間
cn: Slowing by 6%
Duration: 4s

en: Activate to increase your movement speed by 0.65(Melee)/0.45(Ranged) for 3 seconds
Ignore unit collision
Performing an action other than moving cancels this effect

他の対象と衝突しません。

クールダウン:8秒

Ignore unit collision

en: Activate to instantly cleanse debuffs or crowd control effects on you
This excludes Airborne, Knockback, and Grab
Cooldown: 45s

エアボーン、ノックバック、捕まりは解除
クールダウン:45秒

エアボーン、ノックバック、捕まりは解除

This excludes Airborne, Knockback, and Grab

Making them invulnerable unable to perform any other actions as well

en: Propelled by a wave of thunder, your Movement Speed gradually increases by 100%.
Colliding with an enemy knocks them back and deals 300 cellular damage.
Duration: 4.5s

4.5秒間
cn: Propelled by a wave of thunder, your Movement Speed gradually increases by 100%.
Colliding with an enemy knocks them back and deals 300 cellular damage.

name.ja: ミニチュアソーラーシステム

kr: 사용 시 3.75m 범위 내 모든 적 실험체를 자신 주변까지 당겨온 후, 1.45초간 기절 시키고 300의 고정피해
en: Pull all enemy test subjects within 3.75m towards the caster, dealing 300 true damage and stunning them for 1.45 seconds.
Cooldown: 65s
ja: アイテム使用時、 3.75m範囲内のすべての敵実験体を自分の近くまで引っ張って、1.45秒間気絶300の固定ダメージを与えます。
クールダウン:65秒
cn: Pull all enemy test subjects within 3.75m towards the caster, dealing 300 true damage and stunning them for 1.45 seconds.
Cooldown: 65s
